verses.verse: At that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Hew <S%H6458><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first, <S%H7223><s%> and come up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me into the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> thee an ark <S%H727><s%> of wood. <S%H6086><s%>

And I will write <S%H3789><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou didst break, <S%H7665><s%> and thou shalt put <S%H7760><s%> them in the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And I made <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> and hewed <S%H6458><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first, <S%H7223><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> into the mount, <S%H2022><s%> having the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> in mine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the tables, <S%H3871><s%> according to the first <S%H7223><s%> writing, <S%H4385><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ten <S%H6235><s%> commandments, <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly: <S%H6951><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them unto <S%H413><s%> me.

And I turned myself <S%H6437><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had made; <S%H6213><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they be, <S%H1961><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took their journey <S%H5265><s%> from Beeroth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H881><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Jaakan <S%H3292><s%> to Mosera: <S%H4149><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> he was buried; <S%H6912><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> ministered in the priest's office <S%H3547><s%> in his stead. <S%H8478><s%>

From thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> unto Gudgodah; <S%H1412><s%> and from <S%H4480><s%> Gudgodah <S%H1412><s%> to Jotbath, <S%H3193><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of rivers <S%H5158><s%> of waters. <S%H4325><s%>

At that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto him, and to bless <S%H1288><s%> in his name, <S%H8034><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> Levi <S%H3878><s%> hath <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> his brethren; <S%H251><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is his inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> according <S%H834><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> him.

And I <S%H595><s%> stayed <S%H5975><s%> in the mount, <S%H2022><s%> according to the first <S%H7223><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> thee.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Arise, <S%H6965><s%> take <S%H1980><s%> thy journey <S%H4550><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they may go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto them.

And now, <S%H6258><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> doth the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> require <S%H7592><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> thee, but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to love <S%H157><s%> him, and to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> thy heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> thy soul, <S%H5315><s%>

To keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> for thy good? <S%H2896><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> is the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> also, with all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> therein is.

Only <S%H7535><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had a delight <S%H2836><s%> in thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> them, and he chose <S%H977><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, even you above all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
Circumcise <S%H4135><s%> therefore <S%H853><s%> the foreskin <S%H6190><s%> of your heart, <S%H3824><s%> and be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> stiffnecked. <S%H6203><s%> <S%H7185><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is God <S%H430><s%> of gods, <S%H430><s%> and Lord <S%H113><s%> of lords, <S%H113><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> a mighty, <S%H1368><s%> and a terrible, <S%H3372><s%> which <S%H834><s%> regardeth <S%H5375><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> persons, <S%H6440><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> taketh <S%H3947><s%> reward: <S%H7810><s%>

He doth execute <S%H6213><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widow, <S%H490><s%> and loveth <S%H157><s%> the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> in giving <S%H5414><s%> him food <S%H3899><s%> and raiment. <S%H8071><s%>
Love <S%H157><s%> ye therefore <S%H853><s%> the stranger: <S%H1616><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye were <S%H1961><s%> strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Thou shalt fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God; <S%H430><s%> him shalt thou serve, <S%H5647><s%> and to him shalt thou cleave, <S%H1692><s%> and swear <S%H7650><s%> by his name. <S%H8034><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> is thy praise, <S%H8416><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> is thy God, <S%H430><s%> that <S%H834><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> for <S%H854><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible things, <S%H3372><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen. <S%H7200><s%>

Thy fathers <S%H1><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons; <S%H5315><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath made <S%H7760><s%> thee as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>
